achievements.name: Centenary
achievements.description: Win 100 games in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Level 10
achievements.description: Reach level 10.

achievements.name: Level 25
achievements.description: Reach level 25.

achievements.name: Level 50
achievements.description: Reach level 50.

achievements.name: Survival Expert
achievements.description: Use health packs to heal 900 health in a single life in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Decorated
achievements.description: Earn 50 postgame medals in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Blackjack
achievements.description: Earn 21 postgame cards in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: The Friend Zone
achievements.description: Play a Quick or Competitive Play game in a group with a friend.

achievements.name: Undying
achievements.description: Get a 20 player kill streak in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: The Path Is Closed
achievements.description: Destroy 3 of Symmetra's Teleporters in a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

achievements.name: Decked Out
achievements.description: Collect 50 unlocks for a single hero.

achievements.name: Die Die Die... Die
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Reaper's Death Blossom in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Slice and Dice
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Genji's Dragonblade in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Their Own Worst Enemy
achievements.description: Kill 2 enemies with a single use of Genji's Deflection in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Waste Not, Want Not
achievements.description: Get 3 solo kills with a single clip of Reaper's shotguns in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Whoa There!
achievements.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with McCree's Flashbang in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: It's High Noon
achievements.description: Get 4 killing blows with a single use of McCree's Deadeye in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Death From Above
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies in a row without touching the ground as Pharah in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Clearing the Area
achievements.description: Knock an enemy to their death using Pharah's Concussive Blast in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Rocket Man
achievements.description: Get 2 killing blows with a single use of Soldier: 76's Helix Rockets in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Target Rich Environment
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Soldier: 76's Tactical Visor in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Total Recall
achievements.description: Recover 400 health using Tracer's Recall without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Special Delivery
achievements.description: Stick 4 of Tracer's Pulse Bombs onto enemies in a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

achievements.name: Triple Threat
achievements.description: Kill 2 enemies in each of Bastion's configurations without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Charge!
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Bastion's Configuration: Tank in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: The Dragon Is Sated
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies with one of Hanzo's Spirit Dragons in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Ice Blocked
achievements.description: Block 1200 damage with a single use of Mei's Ice Wall in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Cold Snap
achievements.description: Freeze 4 enemies at once with Mei in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Simple Geometry
achievements.description: Get 2 killing blows with a single use of Hanzo's Scatter Arrow in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Mine Like a Steel Trap
achievements.description: Knock an enemy into your Steel Trap using Junkrat's Concussion Mine in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Roadkill
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of Junkrat's RIP-Tire in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Raid Wipe
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies during a single use of Torbjörn's Molten Core in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Armor Up!
achievements.description: Have one of Torbjörn's Armor Packs on 5 allies at the same time in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Did That Sting?
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies using Widowmaker's Venom Mine during a single Quick or Competitive Play game.

achievements.name: Smooth as Silk
achievements.description: Kill an enemy with a scoped headshot while airborne as Widowmaker in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Giving You the Hook
achievements.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with Roadhog's Hook in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Mine Sweeper
achievements.description: Destroy 10 turrets or traps using Winston's Tesla Cannon without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Power Overwhelming
achievements.description: Keep Zarya's particle cannon above 70 power for 60 seconds in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: The Power of Attraction
achievements.description: Capture 5 enemies in a single use of Zarya's Graviton Surge in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Shot Down
achievements.description: Prevent 1500 damage with a single use of D.va's Defense Matrix in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Game Over
achievements.description: Kill 4 enemies with a single use of D.va's Self Destruct in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: I Am Your Shield
achievements.description: Block 8000 damage with Reinhardt's Barrier Field without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Storm, Earth and Fire
achievements.description: Land Reinhardt's Fire Strike and Charge after an Earthshatter stun in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Hog Wild
achievements.description: Knock 2 enemies to their deaths with one use of Roadhog's Whole Hog in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Anger Management
achievements.description: Damage 6 enemies during a single use of Winston's Primal Rage in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Supersonic
achievements.description: Block 1000 damage with a single use of Lúcio's Sound Barrier in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Group Health Plan
achievements.description: Restore 200 health for 5 players without dying as Mercy in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Huge Rez
achievements.description: Resurrect 4 players at once with Mercy in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: The Floor Is Lava
achievements.description: Get 3 killing blows while wall riding as Lúcio without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: The Car Wash
achievements.description: Hit an enemy with 7 beams simultaneously as Symmetra in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Huge Success
achievements.description: Teleport 20 players in a single Quick or Competitive Play game as Symmetra.

achievements.name: Rapid Discord
achievements.description: Get 4 kills or assists with Zenyatta's Orb of Discord within 6 seconds in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: The Iris Embraces You
achievements.description: Restore 1500 health with a single use of Zenyatta's Transcendence in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Naptime
achievements.description: Interrupt an enemy ultimate ability with Ana's Sleep Dart in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Enabler
achievements.description: Get 4 kills or assists with a single use of Ana's Nano Boost in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Double Cap
achievements.description: Capture both objectives on a Capture map without dying in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Can't Touch This
achievements.description: Prevent the attacking team from touching the payload for 1 minute in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Shutout
achievements.description: Win a Control map without the enemy capturing an objective in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: World Traveler
achievements.description: Win a Quick or Competitive Play game on 12 different maps.

achievements.name: Lockdown
achievements.description: Win a Capture map on defense without losing the first objective in Quick or Competitive Play.

achievements.name: Escort Duty
achievements.description: Push a payload 100 meters without leaving it in Quick or Competitive Play.
